title: cogentjm
author: cogentjm
content: Hi, BitcoinTalk!We'd like to officially launch our airdrop campaign!HEXROAST is an upcoming NFT game based on play-to-earn principle.Become the strongest player and earn money with just your skill.Follow 5 simple actions to get coins for free.We will send the coins to your wallet and send all the necessary information to your email.We will distribute 500,000 coins of the project among all airdprop participants. The issue of coins will take place on June 15.Read more about the distribution conditions here.Join us and have fun!
